State
struct
State

Represents State in an Automata

Variables
Members of State
id

ID of the State

is_accepting

If the state is an accepted state of the NFA

combined_id

Id used when state is made from combining many states

combined_set

Set of states used to make this state

transitions

Transitions of this set

Functions
State
State(
int 
identifer,
bool 
accept
= 
false
): id(identifer),is_accepting(accept)
Paramaters
identifier

id of the state

accept

If the State is an accepting state
